name: Escape the Mirror
description:
Mouse locking does not work perfectly on the browser. If mouse gets disconnected (you can still see it when level starts), press R to reload the level. Or just download the windows version which runs better

Your mouse cursor got stuck in the mirror dimension. With the guide of stranger from the mirror dimension, you control your cursor and its reflection to get it out. But be careful of the refractions preventing your cursor's escape.

Controls:

  • Mouse axis: moving your curson
  • R: Reloud current stage
  • Esc: Back to main menu
  • Enter: Get next message

Mini Jam 121: Reflection Entry

This project was made in 72 hours.  The theme was Reflection and the limitation of windows as a mechanic.

This project was created using Godot v3.5.1 and Photoshop.

Music: “Owl Woods”, from PlayOnLoop.com

Music: “The Foyer”, from PlayOnLoop.com

Draconian Mechanical Pencil font by Nicolas Coronado 

Bakso Sapi font by Locomotype 

Game code is available on github : Escape the Mirror
